meta.description:
There are two products, A and B, which both require two chemical reaction processes: one before and one after. Each unit of product A requires 2 hours for the front process and 3 hours for the back process. Each unit of product B requires 3 hours for the front process and 4 hours for the back process. There are 16 hours available for the front process and 24 hours available for the back process.

For each unit of product B produced, two units of byproduct C are generated, which do not require any additional cost. Up to 5 units of byproduct C can be sold, while the remaining units must be disposed of, with a disposal cost of $2 per unit.

Selling one unit of product A yields a profit of $4, selling one unit of product B yields a profit of $10, and selling one unit of byproduct C yields a profit of $3.

To maximize the total profit obtained, establish the linear programming model for this problem.

params.name: front_time
params.description: Time required for front process per unit of product

params.name: back_time
params.description: Time required for back process per unit of product

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per unit of product sold

params.name: byproduct_profit
params.description: Profit per unit of byproduct C sold

params.name: disposal_cost
params.description: Cost per unit of byproduct C disposed

params.name: max_front_hours
params.description: Maximum available hours for front process

params.name: max_back_hours
params.description: Maximum available hours for back process

params.name: max_byproduct_sales
params.description: Maximum units of byproduct C that can be sold

objective.name: total_profit
objective.expr: quicksum(profit[p] * x[p] for p in Products) + byproduct_profit * y - disposal_cost * (2 * x['B'] - y)
objective.description: Maximize total profit from products and byproduct sales

constraints.name: front_process_hours
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(front_time[p] * x[p] for p in Products)

constraints.name: back_process_hours
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(back_time[p] * x[p] for p in Products)

constraints.name: byproduct_balance
constraints.description: Byproduct C sales cannot exceed production
